xwikidoc.name: FontAwesome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: ## General settings xwiki.iconset.type = font xwiki.iconset.css = $services.webjars.url('org.webjars:font-awesome', 'css/font-awesome.min.css') xwiki.iconset.render.wiki = {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} xwiki.iconset.render.html = xwiki.iconset.icon.cssClass = fa fa-$icon ## XWiki Icon Set (see: http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/XWiki+Icon+Set). add = plus align-center = align-center align-justify = align-justify align-left = align-left align-right = align-right anchor = anchor arrow-in = window-minimize arrows = arrows-alt attach = paperclip backward = backward bell = bell bold = bold bomb = bomb book = book branch = code-fork briefcase = briefcase bug = bug building = building bullet-black = circle calculator = calculator calendar = calendar camera = camera car = car caret-down = caret-down caret-right = caret-right caret-up = caret-up certificate = certificate chart-bar = bar-chart-o chart-organisation = sitemap check = check clock = clock-o cloud = cloud coffee = coffee cog = cog columns = columns comment = comment comments = comments contrast = adjust copy = copy credit-card = credit-card cross = times cube = cube cubes = cubes cut = cut database = database delete = minus-circle desktop = desktop dollar = dollar down = arrow-down download = download drive = hdd-o edit = edit eject = eject emoticon-smile=smile-o envelope = envelope-o error = exclamation-circle euro = euro eye = eye fastbackward = fast-backward fastforward = fast-forward female = female file = file file-archive = file-archive-o file-code = file-code-o file-excel = file-excel-o file-pdf = file-pdf-o file-powerpoint = file-powerpoint-o file-text = file-text-o file-white = file-o file-word = file-word-o film = film filter = filter flag = flag paste pause = pause pencil = pencil phone = phone play = play plus-square = plus-square print = print question = question-circle random = random refresh = refresh remove = times-circle repeat = repeat reposition = arrows right = arrow-right rotate-left = rotate-left rotate-right = rotate-right rss = rss search = search search-minus = search-minus search-plus = search-plus shield = shield = unlink unlock = unlock up = arrow-up user = user volume-down = volume-down volume-off = volume-off volume-up = volume-up warning = exclamation-triangle wiki = globe world = globe wrench = wrench yen = yen ## Silk icons for backward compatibility (see: http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/Silk+Mapping). accept = check anchor = anchor application = square-o application_osx_terminal = terminal application_view_list = list-alt application_view_tile = th-large application_xp_terminal = terminal arrow_branch = code-fork arrow_divide = code-fork arrow_down = arrow-down arrow_in =
